content: each of the next 2sts work 2sc into the next st single_crochet into each of the next 6sts work 2sc into the next st single_crochet into each of the next 2sts work 2sc into the next st single_crochet into each of the remaining 3sts 24sts round 17 single_crochet into each of the first 5sts work 2sc into the next st *single_crochet into each of the next 5sts work 2sc into the next st repeat from * around 28sts round 18 & 19 single_crochet into each st around 28sts round 20 single_crochet into each st around working 2 decreases decrease on each hip 24sts round 21 single_crochet into each st around 24sts round 22 single_crochet into each of the first 4sts decrease *single_crochet into each of the next 4sts decrease repeat from * around 20sts round 23 single_crochet into each st around 20sts round 24 single_crochet into each of the first 3sts decrease *single_crochet into each of the next 3sts decrease repeat from * around 16sts round 25 single_crochet into each st around 16sts round 26 single_crochet into each st around attaching arms through 3sts on either side 16sts round 27 single_crochet into each of the first 2sts decrease *single_crochet into each of the next 2sts decrease repeat from * around 12sts head continue to crochet in continuous spirals without joining the rounds using a stitch marker to keep track of where the beginning of each round starts optional neck definition & head support round still using skin tone yarn work a round of loose slip stitches into the back loops only of round 27…take note of these unworked front loops beneath the slip stitches… you will work the next round round 28 beneath those front loops over the top of the sl sts…this creates an extra thick round that helps to define the neck and supports the head a little here s a two tone version you ll see the two loops on top formed by the slip stitches and then the unworked front loop beneath them you re working into the stitches beneath that unworked front loop round 28 single_crochet into the first st work 2sc into the next st *single_crochet into the next st work 2sc into the next st repeat from * around 18sts round 29 single_crochet into each of the first 2sts work 2sc into the next st *single_crochet into each of the next 2sts work 2sc into the next st repeat from * around 24sts round 30 single_crochet into each of the first 3sts work 2sc into the next st *single_crochet into each of the first 3sts work 2sc into the next st repeat from * around 30sts rnds 31 - 36 single_crochet into each st around 30sts place safety eyes between rnds 33 and 34 with 4sts showing between them round 37 single_crochet into each of the first 3sts decrease *single_crochet into each of the next 3sts decrease repeat from * around 24sts round 38 single_crochet into each of the first 2sts decrease *single_crochet
